game.name: Chronos Trials RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chronos Trials RPG is a loot-driven, incremental roguelite. Fight hundreds of enemies, discover a vast array of equipment and gear, and upgrade yourself to be able to defeat Chronos, the God of Time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chronos Trials RPG is a loot-driven, incremental roguelite. Fight hundreds of enemies, discover a vast array of equipment and gear, and upgrade yourself to be able to defeat Chronos, the God of Time.
